
# Results

## Discharge Data

```{r}
# Plot for discharge 
ggplot(q_ind, aes(x = Date, y = q_in))+
  geom_line()+
  labs( title = 'Discharge at Colorado River Gauge',
        subtitle = 'USGS site 09034350',
        x = 'Year',
        y = 'Q (in/day)',
        caption = 'Discharge (in/day) recorded from 1986-10-01 to 2022-01-01. Site is low burned and located near Grandby, CO.')

# site_no2
ggplot(q2_ind, aes(x = Date, y = q_in))+
  geom_line()+
  labs( title = 'Discharge at Troublesome Creek Gauge',
        subtitle = 'USGS site 09040500',
        x = 'Year',
        y = 'Q (in/day)',
        caption = 'Discharge (in/day) recorded from 2021-05-27 to 2021-12-09. Site is a high burn and is located near Grandby, CO.')

# control site
ggplot(qC_ind, aes(x = Date, y = q_in))+
  geom_line()+
  labs( title = 'Discharge at Fraser River Gauge',
        subtitle = 'USGS site 09027100',
        x = 'Year',
        y = 'Q (in/day)',
        caption = 'Discharge (in/day) recorded from 2011-05-01 to 2022-01-01. ISte is in a non burned area and is the control site.')
```

## Turbidity

```{r}
# site 1
ggplot(Turbidity_1, aes(x = Date, y = mean)) + 
  geom_line(size = 1) + 
  labs(title = 'Turbidity Levels Colorado River',
       subtitle = 'USGS site 09034250',
       caption = 'Turbidity data from USGS site 09034250 COLORADO RIVER AT WINDY GAP, NEAR GRANBY, CO. Reccorded time 2021-06-22 to 2021-10-01. USGS gauge located in low burn area.',
       x = 'Date',
       y = 'T (formazin nephelometric units (FNU))')

# site 2
ggplot(Turbidity_2, aes(x = Date, y = mean)) + 
  geom_line(size = 1) + 
  labs(title = 'Turbidity Levels Troublesom Creek',
       subtitle = 'USGS site 09040500',
       caption = 'Turbidity data from USGS site 09040500 TROUBLESOME CREEK NEAR TROUBLESOME, CO. Reccorded time 2021-06-07 to 2021-10-01. USGS gauge located in high burn area.',
       x = 'Date',
       y = 'T (formazin nephelometric units (FNU))')

# site 3
ggplot(Turbidity_3, aes(x = Date, y = mean)) + 
  geom_point(size = 1) + 
  labs(title = 'Turbidity Levels Grand Lake Outlet',
       subtitle = 'USGS site 09014050',
       caption = 'Turbidity data from USGS site 09014050 GRAND LAKE OUTLET BLW CHIPMUNK LN AT GRAND LK, CO. Recorded time from 2010-04-13 to 2021-10-01. USGS gauge located in low burn area.',
       x = 'Date',
       y = 'T (formazin nephelometric units (FNU))')

#control site
ggplot(Turbidity_C, aes(x = Date, y = mean)) + 
  geom_point(size = 1) + 
  labs(title = 'Turbidity Levels Fraser River',
       subtitle = 'USGS site 09070500',
       caption = 'Turbidity data from USGS site 09060799 FRASER RIVER AT TABERNASH, CO. Recorded time from 2021-07-15 to 2022-04-07. USGS gauge loctaed in no burn (contro site)',
       x = 'Date',
       y = 'T (formazin nephelometric units (FNU))')
```

## Combined Data

#### Discharge

```{r}
ggplot(Q_cr, aes(x= BurnLevel, y= q_in))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  scale_y_log10()+
  labs( title = 'Discharge of Sites',
        x = ' Site Burn Level',
        y = 'Q (in/day)',
        caption = 'Discharge (in/day) from Troublesome Creek (high burn), Colorado River (low burn), and Fraser River (no burn)')

```

### Turbidity

```{r}
ggplot(T_cr, aes(x= Date, y= mean, color = BurnLevel ))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_line()+
  scale_y_log10()+
  labs(title = "Turbidity Levels at Four Sites",
       x = "Month",
       y = "Turbidity (FNU)")
```
